title: Font ID: Shinjo Ito text
content:
This font looks like Alisal or Fedra but it’s not either of those.

[http://www.shinjoito.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120506075057/http:/www.shinjoito.com/ "http://www.shinjoito.com/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120506075057im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture3_6380.png)

Do you know it?

Mikey :-)
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content:
I’m pretty sure I just saw this around here recently.  
But I can’t remember what and where.

Sorry, Mickey.

(Wouldn't it be great to have something like an image feed on this forum?  
A page with all the images that have been submitted for id. A mosaic, and clicking on an image takes you to the thread. )  
F.

Probably custom, Mikey. It does have the feel of Matthew Carter's Charter. Checking the PDF on their site, it's listed as "ShinnyoType Regular" by Carter & Cone Type Inc. (2006).

[http://www.shinjoito.com/exhibition/pdf/press\_release\_chicago2.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20120506075057/http:/www.shinjoito.com/exhibition/pdf/press_release_chicago2.pdf "http://www.shinjoito.com/exhibition/pdf/press\_release\_chicago2.pdf")

WOW! You’ve done it again Angel.

I’ll give Cherrie Cone a buzz to find out the scoop.

Mikey :-)
I never did report back, but yes I got confirmation that Matthew Carter did design this.
